snippet: Frustrated by Russia’s refusal to address concerns that it has violated an arms control accord, the Pentagon plans to strengthen defenses against Moscow’s nuclear weapons programs.
abstract: United States is moving ahead with plans to strengthen Europe's defenses amid Russia's arms breach.
lead_paragraph: Frustrated by Russia’s refusal to address concerns that it has violated an arms control accord, the Pentagon plans to strengthen defenses against Moscow’s nuclear weapons programs.

headline.main: U.S. Plans to Counter Arms Breach by Russia
